headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific Awarded $94.5 Million U.S. Government Contract to Supply the Navy with Advanced Radiation Detection Systems
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., June 23, 2025--Thermo Fisher Scientific, the world leader in serving science, today announced that it has been awarded a five-year, $94.5 million contract by the U.S. Department of Defense (DoD) to supply the Navy with a next-generation dosimetry system alongside updated radiation health and database management software.
